content: **new the spanish translation is available here 1 ** many thanks to mavivi 2 simple little cowl knit in the round with knit/purl textured details easy to customise you can knit it in only a few hours the perfect last minute gift as for the yarn the softer is the better this pattern was designed to showcase the subtle color variations of hand dyed yarns pattern available in both english and french 1 https //docs google com/file/d/0b07qcpq2nrdly0fiytfrd2hwy0u/edit usp=sharing&pli=1 2 http //www ravelry com/people/mavivi
